properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Watch issued January 1 at 10:10PM PST until January 4 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 30 to 35 kt with gusts
to 45 kt with high and very steep seas becoming very high. For
the Small Craft Advisory, high and steep seas around 14 ft at 18
seconds diminishing to around 10 ft at 14 seconds early Friday,
then increasing. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, very steep seas
of 17 to 22 feet at 14 seconds possible.

* WHERE...Advisory conditions into Friday afternoon. Gales Friday
afternoon through Friday evening. Then Hazardous Seas are
possible Friday evening through Saturday afternoon.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 PM to 10 PM PST Friday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM PST Friday. For the
Hazardous Seas Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
